flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
In this tutorial, I will show you how to make an origami Rabbit Cube. Enjoy :D!

Design: Fumiaki Shingu

Tips: Take care of your folds at the beginning, and the rest should be fairly easy if you follow the tutorial exactly. Make careful folds, and make sure everything is properly aligned.
guide.introduction_rendered:
In this tutorial, I will show you how to make an origami Rabbit Cube. Enjoy :D!

Tips: Take care of your folds at the beginning, and the rest should be fairly easy if you follow the tutorial exactly. Make careful folds, and make sure everything is properly aligned.
guide.summary: Make a cube with rabbit faces on all sides. Perfect for Easter decorations!
guide.title: Origami Rabbit Cube
